CatDescriptText: Cutline from related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 23, 1939, pg. 20 " Hollywood Make-Up Men Coming To Pittsburgh - The Hollywood Make-Up Men who have taken the Detroit women by storm since September 27 will pack their bags on December 30 and will leave for Pittsburgh..." Cutline from related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 3, 1940, pg. 9 reads: "Hollywood Make-Up Artists On Way To Birmingham, Ala. BIRMINGHAM, Ala., Feb. 1 - The Hollywood Make-Up Artists headed by Harry L. Warner, are on their way to Alabama's City of Steel...fresh from a great beauty campaign in North's City of Steel (Pittsburgh)..." Cutline from related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 13, 1940, pg. 20 "Southernaires Entertain Harry L. Warner - The Southernaires, of radio fame, entertained Harry L. Warner, Hollywood make-up man..."
TitMainTitle: "Hollywood Make-Up Man" Harry L. Warner using brush to apply makeup on woman wearing shiny striped light colored blouse and brooch, seated on arm of chair in Princess Beauty Salon with sign reading "Hollywood Make-Up Men, Actually I'll give you the New Hollywood Mask Facial, which will give you an attractive skin and A Glamorous Make-Up...you'll be Amazed when you see yourself. Thurs. Feb 8...Regular Price $1.00"
